entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
